text: Martin Joseph Damm (born 30 September 2003) is an American junior tennis player. On the junior tour, Damm has a career high junior ranking of 4, achieved on 15 July 2019. In August 2019, Damm and his partner Toby Kodat won the USTA Boys 18s National Championships doubles title, earning the pair a wild-card entry into the doubles main draw of the 2019 US Open. Damm and fellow American Toby Kodat became the youngest men's doubles team to win a US Open match in the Open Era.
